sentences.en: After being infected with this disease, cattle intermittently excrete virus under natural conditions.
sentences.cn: 牛感染本病后, 在自然条件下不定期排毒.

sentences.en: Albumin excrete rate AER decreased only in the Captopril Treated groups.
sentences.cn: 尿微量白蛋白排泄率(AER) 仅Captopril组显著下降.

sentences.en: Besides, sports stimulate the circulation of blood and help to excrete the wastes in the body.
sentences.cn: 另外, 运动促进血液循环,有助于排泄体内废物.

sentences.en: Dogs are not permitted to foul ( ie excrete on ) the pavement.
sentences.cn: 禁止狗在人行道上 便溺.

sentences.en: In extreme conditions, human Beings may excrete several litres of such sweat in an hour.
sentences.cn: 在极端的环境中, 人体可以在一小时内排出几公升汗液.

sentences.en: It is a tribute to the capacity of the kidneys to excrete alkali.
sentences.cn: 这对肾脏排碱功能是个负担.

sentences.en: Many microorganisms synthesize and excrete compounds which are selectively toxic to other microorganisms.
sentences.cn: 许多微生物能合成并分泌一些对其它微生物具选择性毒力的化合物.

sentences.en: The carbohydrate intake of a diabetic exceeds the capacity of his kidney to excrete sugar.
sentences.cn: 糖尿病人吸入的碳水化合物超过肾排泄糖的能力.

sentences.en: The function of the kidneys is to excrete waste products.
sentences.cn: 肾脏的功能是排泄代谢废物.

sentences.en: The function of the kidneys is to excrete wastes from the body.
sentences.cn: 肾的功能是排泄人体里的废物.

sentences.en: The urinary system is comprised of organs which produce urine and excrete it from the body.
sentences.cn: 泌尿系统是由产生尿液和向体外排尿的器官组成的.

sentences.en: To drink 350 - 500 ml warm water to help excrete toxins after treatment.
sentences.cn: 喝对帮忙的 350-500 毫升温暖的水排泄毒素后疗法.

sentences.en: To excrete or discharge ( waste matter ), especially from the bowels.
sentences.cn: 通过排泄道排出 ( 废物 ), 尤指从肠.

sentences.en: Ya ma root can help the function of the kidneys to excrete toxins.
sentences.cn: 亚麻根有助于肾脏的排毒功能.

sentences.en: Your open pores excrete sweat and dirt.
sentences.cn: 通过张开的毛孔排出汗液和污垢。

words.tran_cn: 排泄的，分泌的；有排泄功能的
排泄，排泄物；分泌，分泌物

trans.tran_en: to get rid of waste material from your body through your bowels, your skin etc
